subject: Quick note: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
body:
Common AI model evaluation metrics include accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, and AUC. 
Model parameter optimization involves adjusting parameters to minimize the difference between predicted and actual outputs. 
Synthetic data can overcome limitations of real-world data, such as scarcity, privacy concerns, and class imbalance. 
Model evaluation metrics are quantitative measures used to assess the performance of a machine learning model, such as accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score. 
Rule-based synthetic data generation is limited by the expressiveness of the defined rules.

Goal: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
